response.overview: Humein Haq Chahiye Haq Se is a social-political drama that is based on the policy of the caste based reservation system prevalent in India. It narrates the story of a brilliant student who student who even after scoring good marks, struggles to get a government job because of the competition in the selection of reserved category candidates. Frustrated with the reservation system, he forms a group and helps people understand the pros and cons of reservations and eventually garners wide public support.
response.title: Humein Haq Chahiye Haq Se
